{{Wired embedded system |brand=LaCie |model=d2 Network |revision=2 |asin=B0038CRQQS |newegg=N82E16822154434 |is_manuf=No |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel plug |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=25L4005A |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU128M8GE-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=SATA II, eSATA, USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag=yes, 8-pin header, unpopulated, J2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4K I2Câ„¢ Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC04B;;1;,,, Dual Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop;Texas Instruments;AHC74;;1;,,, 3A, 28V, 1.4MHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2365DN;;1; |flags=eSATA, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell version: 3.4.16 LaCie 1.5.20 |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22.18;LSP Version KW LSP 4.2.7 patch2;, |tp_firmware=Debian |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui_eth=00:D0:4B }} '''LaCie d2 Network 2'''
[https://www.lacie.com/support/network-storage/d2-network-2/ Product Support page]
"LaCie Group", "d2Next-NAS KW" and "0901 550 Rev C" are silkscreened on the board.
